participants.name: Brian Koegle
participants.url: Studied Economics and Psychology at The Ohio State University

messages.message:
Wendy
Hey guys, this message was sent to me from Jim so I am passing it on to you all. PLease pass this on to others I have missed. Let me know what works for you all.
Wendy


From Jim:
Hey there, I have been working on a new date for the reunion due the conflict with the (Lee) wedding. 
I was considering taking a poll to see what date would work best. My thinking was this. We could do it 4th of July weekend again or right after Thanksgiving on the weekend of December 4th and 5th. July 4th is on a Sunday this year. So, assuming Saturday would be the main event day, it would be on July 3rd. Using that same logic December 4th would be the other date. I usually advertise 2 days. Saturday and Sunday.
One thing to note is the relatives in Ireland have expressed an interest in coming. I have relayed all the information above to them and am awaiting a response. I also left open the possibility of leaving the dates as is, that being August 6,7, and 8th.
If you could ask around that would be a huge help. None of the dates above are set in stone either. My summer and fall are pretty wide open at this point
See if you can get any feedback for me. Thanks.

C.p.
A chat with the cousins is looking like July 4th is going to work best for them.
So, just think - you will get to me the relations from Ireland!
I sent Jim a message about this.
I shall be in Ireland in two weeks for a visit - so I shall let you know more after that.

Take care.

C.P.
